original_text: The men of Ephraim's tribe joined together to make an army. They crossed over the Jordan River to Zaphon. They said to Jephthah, ‘Why did you go to fight against the Ammonites without us? You should have asked us to go with you. Now we will burn down your house with you inside it!’
korean_text: 에브라임 사람들이 모여 북쪽으로 가서 입다에게 이르되 네가 암몬 자손과 싸우러 건너갈 때에 어찌하여 우리를 불러 너와 함께 가게 하지 아니하였느냐 우리가 반드시 너와 네 집을 불사르리라 하니

sentences.original_text: The men of Ephraim's tribe joined together
They crossed over the Jordan River
'Why did you go to fight against the Ammonites
sentences.korean_translation: 왜 당신은 암몬 사람들과 싸우러 갔습니까

sentences.original_text: Now we will burn down your house
sentences.korean_translation: 이제 우리는 당신의 집을 불태울 것입니다
